nodes.text: A beskad was a Mandalorian sword with a single-edged blade that widened toward the tip before tapering to a point. Two metal guards protected the wielder's hand at the top and base of the hilt. The weapon was based on a design from the ancient Taung. Traditionally, it was accompanied by the kal dagger in the wielder's off hand.
The beskad was first named by author Karen Traviss in her now-Legends e-novella Boba Fett: A Practical Man.
